person.note: Cheng(1) Ju [7007] He lived in Suzhou for a time, but he was buried in Kaihua county. Used his maternal grandfather Deng(1) Runfu's [8126] yin to obtain office. Tianmin's [7136] son, Tianzhi's [7135] nephew. Cheng Ju, WJ, 'hou,' 1a-7a; Suzhou FZ, 139.22a. CBD, 4, 3008-9.
